meanings.definition: The status or position of being an heir.
meanings.sent1: His heirdoms as the eldest son meant he would inherit the title and responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her heirdoms as the next ruler of the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The young prince joked about the weight of his heirdoms, pretending to wear a crown.

meanings.sent5: The heirdoms awaited her, a mix of privilege and duty intertwined.
